name: Shrushti Agro
overview:
Established in the year 2011, we, Shrushti Agro, are one of the eminent manufacturers and suppliers of an excellent range of Karvanda & Papaya Fruity, Lime Peel & Amla Murabba. Variety of Fruit Juices and Amla Murabba is hygienically processed using genuine quality ingredients that are sourced from the trusted vendors of the industry. Amla is a rich source of fibre, vitamin C and several minerals such as zinc, chromium and copper.

Our Team: Food technologists Processors Quality controllers Skilled and semi-skilled workers Marketing and sales executives Packaging personnel Logistic support

Quality Assurance: Our organisation’s aim motive is to offer a quality-assured range of Karvanda Fruity, Papaya Fruity, Sweet Lime Peel, Amla Murabba in the market. Juices, lime peel and amla murabba are processed using genuine quality ingredients that are sourced from some of the trusted vendors of the market.

Our Infrastructure: We have a sophisticated infrastructure, equipped with modern facilities that are required for offering a supreme quality range of Karvanda Fruity, Papaya Fruity, Sweet Lime Peel, Amla Murabba to the clients.

Client Satisfaction: We make sure to offer a wide range of genuine quality Karvanda Fruity, Papaya Fruity, Sweet Lime Peel, Amla Murabba to the customers, which assists us to attain their maximum level of satisfaction.
